name: WarmTilesESWThermostat
0: ”"Alexa, set the Bathroom temperature to 70 degrees"”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: The Warm Tiles ESW Thermostat offers outstanding temperatur control for the greatest comfort in your home. The comprehensive set of functions and features supported by the most intutive user interface leaves you in the full control - any time and through the App (iOS or Android) from anywhere. The integrated support for Alexa enables you to take charge of you comfort in the most straight forward and efficient way - just speak out you request and Alexa will assist you! All you have to do is to select "Enable skill" for linking you account and afterwards have Alexa connect to your Bathroom Alexa will then respond to requests like "Alexa, what is the temperatur in my kitchen?" or "Alexa, increase the temperature in my bathroom by 3 degrees".
